articles.title: Rs 195 crore in cash, 23 kg gold seized from Kanpur businessman Piyush Jain’s residence, factory - India Today
articles.description: The Directorate General of GST Intelligence seized over Rs 195 crore in cash, 23 kilograms of gold and sandalwood oil worth Rs 6 crore after conducting searches at several premises linked to businessman Piyush Jain in Kanpur and Ujjain.
